en_US.project_summary: ZT is a blockchain digital currency trading platform, focusing on providing convenient BTC、ETH、LTC market trading services and smooth trading experience for   digital currency lovers. We have been committed to creating a more convenient Bitcoin trading platform.

zh_CN.project_summary: ZT是一个区块链数字货币交易平台，专注于为数字货币爱好者提供便捷的BTC、ETH、LTC市场交易服务和流畅的交易体验。我们一直致力于创建一个更方便的比特币交易平台。
